properties.areaDesc: Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains; Northeast Bighorn Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 2:05AM MST until February 9 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. In Montana,
Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel on Highway 14 through Burgess Junction, and on
roads in the Story area, will be difficult due to the snow and
poor visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY
